ValidationRule.description: Regla que bloquea la actualización del campo 'Ocean Expo Shipment Status' cuando no se ha confirmado la 'Recolección' por Comercio Exterior
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS( Name, 'SP-CE')), ISPICKVAL(Freight_Mode__c, 'Sea'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Realizacion_CE_Status__c, 'Alta Cliente AA'), ISPICKVAL( Realizacion_CE_Status__c, 'Clasificación Arancelaria'), ISPICKVAL( Realizacion_CE_Status__c, 'Realización de Facturas') ), OR( ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status__c, 'Pending but Pre-Captured'), ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status__c, 'Booking Confirmation'), ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status__c, 'Planned for delivery - Not yet on route'), ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status__c, 'Captured but not yet sent EDI'), ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status__c, 'Pending - Missing Documents/Instructions'), ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status__c, 'Submitted to Customs'), ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status__c, 'Cleared but Awaiting Vessel'), ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status__c, 'Delivered'), ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status__c, 'Cleared but Stopped'), ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status__c, 'Delivered to Depot'), ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status__c, 'ETA -15'), ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status__c, 'ETA -10'), ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status__c, 'ETA -7'), ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status__c, 'ETA -4'), ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status__c, 'In Progress'), ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status__c, 'TLX Confirmation'), ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status__c, 'Delivery On route'), ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status__c, 'Finished') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CE-OESS-001: No se puede cambiar "Ocean Expo Shipment Status" a esta etapa cuando no se ha confirmado la 'Recolección' por Comercio Exterior
